Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Traits.Name: Cronies
Traits.Description: The Skimmer starts combat with 4 mob allies, regardless of encounter budget.

Interrupts.Name: Understreet Loyalty
Interrupts.Trigger: The Skimmer is targeted by an attack or ability from a foe.
Interrupts.Effect: The Skimmer changes the target to one of its adjacent allies. If it has no adjacent allies, it can't take this interrupt.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Beat Down
Actions.Effect: On hit: Each other ally of the Skimmer adjacent to the target foe deals fray damage to them.

Actions.Name: That One
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 must save or become marked. That character is vulnerable and branded while marked.

Actions.Name: Gang Up
Actions.Description: Up to three allies of the Skimmer in range 5 can dash 3 spaces. If they end their turn adjacent to the same character, each of them deals fray damage to that character.
